SBCOLED01.oledClear: Clears all outputs on the OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawCircle: Draws a circle on the OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawCircle|param|x: X coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawCircle|param|y: Y coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine: Draws a line on the OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine|param|x0: X coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine|param|x1: X coordinate of the end position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine|param|y0: Y coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawLine|param|y1: Y coordinate of the end position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawRectangle: Draws a rectangle on the OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledDrawRectangle|param|x: X coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledDrawRectangle|param|y: Y coordinate of the start position
SBCOLED01.oledShowString: Shows a string on the OLED display
SBCOLED01.oledShowString|param|str: The string which is supposed to be displayed
